survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with Electric Scooter Sharing Services Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate customer satisfaction and identify areas for improvement in electric scooter sharing services.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability of electric scooters in your area?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for clarity and ease of analysis.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability of electric scooters in your area?

questions.question_text: Which of the following issues have you encountered while using electric scooter sharing services? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice question to identify common pain points.

script.question_text: Which of the following issues have you encountered while using electric scooter sharing services? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How often do you use electric scooter sharing services?
questions.client_notes: Use frequency scale to segment users by engagement.

script.question_text: How often do you use electric scooter sharing services?

questions.question_text: What improvements would make you use electric scooter sharing services more frequently?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback.

script.question_text: What improvements would make you use electric scooter sharing services more frequently?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend electric scooter sharing services to a friend or colleague?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure Net Promoter Score (NPS).

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend electric scooter sharing services to a friend or colleague?
